Class Board

extends java.lang.Object
    Class Board is the board for each game.

    • Method Detail

      • deepCopy

        public Board deepCopy()
        creates a deep copy of the board.
        Returns:
        the copy of the board.
        Ensures
        the result is a new board., the values of all the fields on the new board are the same as the values of the fields on this board.

      • getField

        public Field getField​(int index)
        This method might not be needed. Gives the index for the field.
        Returns:
        the index beloning to the (row,col)- field.
        Requires
        0 < row && row <= NUMBERING.length, 0 < dia && dia <= NUMBERING.length //@param field -the field of which you want to get the index.

      • getPositionInArray

        public int getPositionInArray​(int index)
        maps the index with the position in the field[]. for example index 11 is fields[0]
        Parameters:
        index - - the value(index) of a field
        Returns:
        - the position of the field in fields[]

      • getFields

        public Field[] getFields()
        returns all the fields of the board.

      • isField

        public boolean isField​(int index)
        Checks whether a given index is a field of the board.
        Parameters:
        index - - the value(index) of a field

      • hasWinner

        public boolean hasWinner()
        indicates if there is a winner.
        Returns:
        true if (one of the) other player(s) have lost 6 marbles.

      • gameEnd

        public boolean gameEnd()
        game ends if there is a winner or after 96 turns there still is no winner.
        Returns:
        true if the game has ended

      • currentBoard

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> currentBoard()
        returns the current state of the board.

      • validMove

        public boolean validMove​(Move move)
        inquires if the move is valid. Rules: you can move max 3 marbles of your own/your team. you can move less opposite marbles than you move your own/team's. you can only move the opposites marbles into a free space or off the board. you can only move one (1) space. you can only move a column if it at least contains one of your own marbles. you cannot move your own or team's marble off the board. if the move is a side-step move, all of the spaces the marbles are moving to have to be free. can only move in-line if the first marble is your own. side-step can be done by both team members.
        Returns:
        true if the move meets the game rules.
        Requires
        move != null.
        Ensures
        result = true if move is valid && result = false if move is invalid

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        returns the String representation of the current board.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
